description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) enabled and used the default system managed account, DefaultAccount, via `"powershell.exe" /c net user DefaultAccount /active:yes` to connect to a targeted Exchange server over RDP.(Citation: DFIR Phosphorus November 2021)

external_references.description: DFIR Report. (2021, November 15). Exchange Exploit Leads to Domain Wide Ransomware. Retrieved January 5, 2023.
